text: Mangifera andamanica is belonging to the family Anacardiaceae and endemic to Andaman Islands in the Bay of Bengal. Fruits are edible, small in size. This species is conserving at the Field Gene bank of Jawaharlal Neheru Tropical Botanic Garden and research Institute, Thiruvananthapuram, India. ==References== andamanica Category:Flora of the Andaman Islands Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mangifera andamanica
